kwb.utils 0.15.0 2024-03-28

    • rbindFirstRows(),
    • seqAlongRows(),

    • expandToVector()

    • allow to lookup more than one value column
    • add arguments ‚Äúdrop‚Äù, ‚ÄúincludeKeys‚Äù
  • findPartialDuplicates()
    • reimplement the function in order to fix a üêõ
  • use catAndRun() within sourceScripts()

  • add nameElements()
  • parallelNonNA(): use class of input vector ‚Äúa‚Äù as class of output vector
  • fix bug in catAndRun(): show an appropriate time unit, not always ‚Äúseconds‚Äù

kwb.utils 0.9.0 2021-11-16

  • fix bug in multiColumnLookup(): Consider ‚Äúvalue‚Äù argument

kwb.utils 0.8.0 2021-02-19

  • add: matrixToDataFrame()
  • add (private): get_cache_dir(), set_cache_dir()
  • add: readLinesWithEncoding(), moved from fakin.path.app::read_lines()
  • get_cached(): add argument ‚Äúdbg‚Äù; return NULL if file does not exist
  • lastElement(): do not use tail() for lists, use x[[length(x)]] instead
  • orderBy(): allow to order by multiple columns
  • preparePdf(): set paper to ‚Äúspecial‚Äù if width or height are set
  • readDictionary(): add arguments ‚ÄúfileEncoding‚Äù, ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù, pass on to readLinesWithEncoding()
  • writeDictionary(): check ‚Äúfile‚Äù argument. Do not check the file path unless ‚Äúfile‚Äù is of class character (and not a connection)

kwb.utils 0.7.0 2020-07-31

  • new functions: backspace(), createAccessor(), createStorage(), left(), listToDepth(), objectToText(), orderBy(), repeated(), reproducibleSample(), right(), space(), substSpecialChars(), textToObject()
  • new generic (S3) function: print.repro_sample
  • listToDepth(): Avoid endless recursion by checking for empty directory names, add argument ‚Äútemplate‚Äù
  • hsSubstSpecChars(): Add upper case umlauts, rename to substSpecialChars(), make deprecated
  • .askForPassword(): Set default ‚ÄúNULL‚Äù for argument ‚Äúaccount‚Äù; return invisible
  • assignGlobally(): Make deprecated and do not use internally any more
  • getPassword(): Return invisible
  • hsPrepPdf(): Do not use internally any more
  • warningDeprecated(): Add argument ‚Äúparentheses‚Äù

kwb.utils 0.5.1 2020-04-20

  • Fix bug in moveColumnsToFront(): keep data frame structure in case that the data frame has only one column
  • createMatrix(): Set defaults for name.row and name.col to NULL (was: ‚Äú‚Äú)
